title: Wirritt wirritt [Italian version]: an Australian legend
creator_credit: Malcolm Otton, Australian news and Information Bureau and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Artist James Cant re-creates, in rock paintings, an ancient Aboriginal legend about the origins of making fire. Narrated by Ray Barrett.
creator_credit_for_label: Malcolm Otton, Australian news and Information Bureau and Australian National Film Board
